thread.title: LG Develops Massive Double-sided 4K OLED TV
thread.title_full: LG Develops Massive Double-sided 4K OLED TV

title: LG Develops Massive Double-sided 4K OLED TV
text:
Get Business & Technology Alerts 
8 Sep 2015 06:14 AM EST 
The hottest tech in displays right now is OLED and 4K. Combine the two and you have a fantastic, high resolution at any size TV, but LG has gone a step further by developing a double-sided 4K OLED TV. If that wasnâ€™t enough to impress you, they also made it 111-inches big. LG achieved the 111-inch size by combining three 65-inch OLED panels while keeping the display just a handful of millimeters thick. A smaller 55-inch double-sided TV was also present with its thickness listed as just 5.3mm.
